name: Dungeon fireman
description:
An entry for the "My first game jam: Summer 2018"

Thank you for playing!

Controls

Move: W A S D Shoot: Mouse button ObjectiveBring princesses back to the start zone.

Game jam details: My goals
  1. Create and upload a game regardless of how good or bad it is
Feedback

I'd love to hear your feedback!

Resources used

Art:

  • Tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/lots-of-free-2d-tiles-and-sprites-by-hyptosis
  • Character/Enemy:https://finalbossblues.itch.io/pixel-shooter-towers-asset-pack
  • Princess: https://akylrum.itch.io/kdp
  • Potion: https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-potions-16x16

Audio

  • Game music: Made by mbg180#1863 @Discord
  • Walking: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270418/
  • Shooting: https://freesound.org/people/coolguy244e/sounds/266977/
